about_the_game:
RENEGADE STASH BUNDLE

A solid foundation for any aspiring outlaw. This bundle is perfect for advancing your rank, customizing your ships, and commanding a sharper sense of style.

This bundle contains:

30 days of Elite Status - Enable you and your allies to progress faster with every battle.
50,000 Credits - Purchase new ships and modules.
1,000 GP - Customize the appearance of your ships and captain avatar.
Zaratan Hero Ship - Ram your enemies with the turtle-headed bow of this Tier-IV Oberon destroyer.
Venomous decal collection - An exclusive decal for any of your ships.
Venomous coating collection - An exclusive coating for any of your ships.
Venomous emblem collection - The first holographic emblem in the game is only available in this bundle! Equip its glowing green on any of your ships.
Hazmat Mask - Protect your face. Intimidate foes.


HERO SHIP BENEFITS: WHAT YOU GET WITH THE ZARATAN

Faster progression - Hero Ships give a 10% boost to your XP and Credits—even if you leave them unused in your fleet while you play other ships. This extra XP earned is 70% convertible and 30% free (usable on any ship right away).
Custom ship parts - You can use the Zaratan’s figurehead, forecastle, bridge, hull, and stern on any Oberon destroyer that you own.
Unique vanity items - Each Hero Ship provides additional items that you can use on any of your ships. With the Zaratan, you get its coating collection, Light decal collection, and Dark decal collection.
Instant access to higher tiers - You can use the Tier-IV Zaratan to play in Veteran and Legendary matches—before you unlock any Tier-IV ships in regular progression.

name: Dreadnought Renegade Stash DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 3.6 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 750ti 1GB/GTX 1050 2GB or AMD 7850 1GB/RX 560 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 28 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 2.8 GHz or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 4 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 28 GB available space

short_description: A solid foundation for any aspiring outlaw. This bundle is perfect for advancing your rank, customizing your ships, and commanding a sharper sense of style.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German*, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
